Posts.Content: On 1/31/2006 Thedee wrote: Ukrain is said to be 95 percent effective in the early stages of cancer. Dr Guerrero in California uses this and I have personally talked to him about it and has very good success with it.  Hi!  Where is Dr. Guerrero located in CA and what is his first name?  Having trouble locating him for Ukrain treatment.  Thank you for you help.
Posts.Title: Need More Info on Ukrain for Breast Cancer
